10 CLS(0)
20 READ N,C
21 IF C=7 THEN C=8
22 IF C=1 THEN C=2
30 IF N=999 THEN 110
40 FOR M=1 TON
50 READ Y,B
60 FOR X=31-B TO 31+B
70 IF C=4 THEN RESET(X,Y):GOTO80
71 SET (X,Y,C)
80 NEXT X
90 NEXT M
100 GOTO 20
110 READ Y,B,E,C
112 IF C=1 THEN C=2:GOTO120
113 IF C=7 THEN C=8:GOTO120
114 IF C=2 THEN C=8:GOTO120
120 IF Y=0 THEN 170
130 FOR X=B TO E
140 SET (X,Y,C)
150 NEXT X
160 GOTO 110
170 POKE B+15360,E+16
180 IF B=1200 THEN 210
190 READ B,E
200 GOTO 170
210 PRINT@176-66,"—ŸŸ’";:POKE1200+15360,133+16:POKE1200+15360+32,191
299 GOTO299
1000 DATA 23,7,3,13,4,15,5,17,6,19,7,21,8,23
1010 DATA 9,24,10,25,11,26,12,27,13,28,14,28
1020 DATA 15,29,16,29,17,30,18,30,19,30,20,31
1030 DATA 21,31,22,31,23,30,24,28,25,25,20,4
1040 DATA 4,6,5,7,6,8,7,10,8,11,9,12,10,15,11
1050 DATA 17,12,18,13,19,14,20,15,21,16,22,17
1060 DATA 22,18,23,19,23,20,23,21,22,22,22,23
1070 DATA 21,20,1,6,3,7,3,8,3,9,3,10,3,11,3
1080 DATA 12,7,13,9,14,11,15,13,16,14,17,15
1090 DATA 18,16,19,17,20,17,21,18,22,18,23,19
1100 DATA 24,19,25,19,999,999,1,23,26,7,1,36
1110 DATA 39,7,2,21,28,7,2,34,41,7,26,21,41,1
1120 DATA 26,45,50,1,26,12,17,1,27,22,40,1,27
1130 DATA 47,50,1,27,12,15,1,28,23,39,1,29,26
1140 DATA 27,2,29,36,37,2,30,26,27,2,30,36,37
1150 DATA 2,31,24,25,2,31,34,35,2,31,28,29,2
1160 DATA 31,38,39,2,0,1167,135,0,1168,139
1170 DATA 1199,139,1200,133
